Entry.JapaneseText: [VARIABLE]
Entry.EnglishText: [VARIABLE]

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Eugene>
Entry.EnglishText: <Eugene>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Mao>
Entry.EnglishText: <Mao>

Entry.JapaneseText: ザピィ
Entry.EnglishText: Zapie

Entry.JapaneseText: <Claire>
Entry.EnglishText: <Claire>

Entry.JapaneseText: select
Entry.EnglishText: Select

Entry.JapaneseText: スールズ
Entry.EnglishText: Sulz

Entry.JapaneseText: スールズ
Entry.EnglishText: Sulz

Entry.JapaneseText: オレの氷とおまえの炎…… 同じなのか……？ この力は一体……？
Entry.EnglishText: My ice and your fire... Are they the same? What is this power...?

Entry.JapaneseText: おまえのその力は<Red>フォルス<White>という。 使い方を誤らなければ、この先、 おまえにとって大きな助けとなる。
Entry.EnglishText: It's a power known as <Red>Force<White>. Use it wisely and it will become a great asset to you from here on out.

Entry.JapaneseText: フォルス……？
Entry.EnglishText: Force?

Entry.JapaneseText: そう、フォルス。
Entry.EnglishText: Yep, Force.

Entry.JapaneseText: これが、 そのフォルスの具現化したもの。 フォルスキューブさ。
Entry.EnglishText: This here is a manifestation of Force. It's called a Force Cube.

Entry.JapaneseText: ボクたちは旅をしている。 ボクやキミのような能力…… フォルスを持った仲間を探すために。 ボクたちの世界を救うために。
Entry.EnglishText: We're on a journey. A journey to find more people who can use Force like you and me. A journey...to save the world.

Entry.JapaneseText: すべてはフォルスによって 起こったコトなんだよ。
Entry.EnglishText: All this happened because of Force, you know.

Entry.JapaneseText: フォルスは 生命と精神のパワーが生み出す <Cyan>特殊能力<White>の事だ。
Entry.EnglishText: Force is a <Cyan>special ability<White> born of both life and spirit.

Entry.JapaneseText: フォルスはもともと 俺のような<Cyan>ガジュマ<White>にしか 発現しないものだった。
Entry.EnglishText: Originally, it only manifested in <Cyan>Gajuma<White> such as myself.

Entry.JapaneseText: だったら、なぜ…… オレやそいつのような <Cyan>ヒューマ<White>にそんな力が……
Entry.EnglishText: If that's the case, then why do <Cyan>Huma<White> like me and him have such powers?

Entry.JapaneseText: ある時から、ヒューマの中にも フォルス能力者が現れるように なったんだよ。
Entry.EnglishText: After a certain incident, Force users have begun to appear amongst Huma as well.

Entry.JapaneseText: 今では、ガジュマやヒューマという 種族の区別なく、色々な種類の フォルスを持った能力者がいるんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: Now it doesn't matter if you are Gajuma or Huma. There are many users of all different types of Force.

Entry.JapaneseText: キミのフォルスは「氷」。
Entry.EnglishText: Your Force is that of Ice.
Entry.Notes: You have the Force of Ice maybe

Entry.JapaneseText: <Yellow>氷のフォルス<White>……
Entry.EnglishText: The <Yellow>Force of Ice<White>...

Entry.JapaneseText: キミは、氷を自在に 操るコトができるでしょ？
Entry.EnglishText: You can manipulate ice at will, right?

Entry.JapaneseText: 今はな…… だが、クレアの氷だけは どうする事もできない……
Entry.EnglishText: I can now, but... I can't seem to do anything about the ice that surrounds Claire.

Entry.JapaneseText: それはキミのフォルスが 暴走した時の氷だからだヨ。
Entry.EnglishText: That's because this ice is from when your Force went berserk.

Entry.JapaneseText: 心の力であるフォルスは、 持つ者の心が不安定だと 過度に反応し、制御できなくなる。
Entry.EnglishText: As a power that comes from the heart, Force can become uncontrollable if its bearer's emotions become unstable.

Entry.JapaneseText: キミの力の覚醒は突然のコトだった。 準備ができていなかったキミの心は 力を制御できずに、彼女を……
Entry.EnglishText: Your power awakened in you suddenly. Being unprepared, your heart couldn't handle it, and she was, well...

Entry.JapaneseText: それがフォルスの暴走なんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: That's what happens when someone's Force goes berserk.

Entry.JapaneseText: この氷は、今のおまえの能力では 消す事は不可能だ。
Entry.EnglishText: It'll be impossible for someone of your current ability to remove this ice.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……どうすればクレアは……
Entry.EnglishText: Then how can I help her?

Entry.JapaneseText: ここはボクに任せて、<Veigue>。 キミが<Yellow>氷<White>ならボクは<Yellow>炎<White>。 <Yellow>氷<White>を溶かすには……
Entry.EnglishText: Leave that to me, <Veigue>. You have Ice, and I have Fire. Now, in order to melt ice...

Entry.JapaneseText: <Yellow>炎<White>を近づければいい。
Entry.EnglishText: ...You have to turn up the heat.

Entry.JapaneseText: フォルスの炎よ!! 氷の眠りから彼女を解き放て!!
Entry.EnglishText: Flames born of Force, release her from her icy slumber!

Entry.JapaneseText: 今だヨ、<Veigue>!! 氷を砕いて!!
Entry.EnglishText: Now, <Veigue>! Break the ice!

Entry.JapaneseText: うぉぉぉぉぉ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Huaaah!

Entry.JapaneseText: クレア!!
Entry.EnglishText: Claire!

Entry.JapaneseText: キーッ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Keee!

Entry.JapaneseText: ……クレア!! 生きている……のか……？
Entry.EnglishText: Claire! You're...alive?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……<Veigue>……？
Entry.EnglishText: ...<Veigue>?

Entry.JapaneseText: クレア……！ どこも痛くないか？ 気分は……？
Entry.EnglishText: Claire! Are you hurt? How are you feeling?

Entry.JapaneseText: うん……私……
クレア……
Entry.EnglishText: Claire...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……クレア…… 震えているのか？
Entry.EnglishText: Claire... Are you shaking?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……う、ううん。 違うの、<Veigue>……
Entry.EnglishText: N-No... I'm fine, <Veigue>.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……ここは少し寒いわ…… 太陽にあたりたいな……
Entry.EnglishText: It's just a little cold in here... I'm going to go warm up in the sun...

Entry.JapaneseText: クレア!!
Entry.EnglishText: Claire!

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140>休憩しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Would you like to rest? Yes No
